SML_OPMODE (ENUM)
SML_OPMODE (ENUM)
Â¶
TYPE SML_OPMODE :
The possible operating modes of an axis.
InOut:
Name
Initial
Comment
SML_OP_UNKNOWN
0
The operating mode is not known
SML_OP_HOMING
1
Homing mode
SML_OP_VELOCITY
2
Velocity mode: continuous movement with constant velocity.
SML_OP_POSITION
3
Position mode: discrete movement to a given position or by a
given distance.

rows.Name: SML_OP_UNKNOWN
rows.Comment: The operating mode is not known

rows.Name: SML_OP_VELOCITY
rows.Comment: Velocity mode: continuous movement with constant velocity.

rows.Name: SML_OP_POSITION
rows.Comment:
Position mode: discrete movement to a given position or by a
given distance.
